You will find in one of our 500 stores and on Nicolas.com, all news, gift ideas, best vintages and of course, all bottles that have marked the year. At Maison Nicolas, there is something for everyone’s taste and desires. The challenge is to find the bottle which corresponds to each opportunity. Whether for a wedding, dinner with friends or simply for pleasure to offer, we help you to find the perfect wine that will sublimate each event. Discover our wide range of red wines, white wines, rosé wines through the whiskies, cognac, Armagnac and other alcohols, including our selection of champagnes and cremants for giving sparkling at all important moments of your life. The most emblematic wine-growing regions are represented. You will find all wines of your favorite vineyard. Thirst for discovery? Let your taste buds travel with our foreign wines selection: Australia, Argentina, South Africa, New Zealand… The destinations proposed will offer you pleasant surprises to expand your horizons. Access without further delay to the wine selection, bargains, crushes of cellarmen, gift ideas. You will find surprising bottles with authentic taste.
